title: [K-12] Remote Practical Competency Development Program for Embedded Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming knowledge (C/Python) and understanding of digital logic circuits
context.additional_context: A low-cost remote education environment presupposing smartphone-based LMS use, requiring hardware kits and mobile-compatible development tools.

learning_goals: Learners independently execute the embedded system development cycle: requirements analysis → hardware configuration → software implementation → testing.
Learners write and debug embedded C code tailored to specified hardware specifications.
Learners design and implement embedded applications that process real sensor data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
